page.title: 06Oakpool _ Hexham Railway
page.content:
Continue up the steep hill you will pass through abuttment of arch for old {Hexham Railway},until you reach { {Staward Villa Farm.}Just beyond the farm, on your right,a stile leads back in the direction of {Allendale.}You will seethe line of the {River East {Allen}far below you and a fine panorama of the valley opens up.You should also note the line of the old railway track not far below but please {DO NOT}attempt towalk along the disused track as it is not a right of way.The now defunct Allendale railway line was opened in January 1868 and ran until November 1950,when the last train passed through Starward Station,on its way up to the Dale.
{Look for waymarks _ yellow arrows.
